hibernate-mapping.query: from Patient as p order by p.lastName, p.firstName
from Patient as p where upper( p.lastName ) like upper( :name ) order by p.lastName, p.firstName
from Patient as p where p.pesel = :pesel order by p.lastName, p.firstName
from Kasach as k order by k.symbolKasa
from Doctor as p order by p.lastName, p.firstName
from Doctor as d where d.symbolDoctor = :symbolDoctor order by d.lastName, d.firstName
from Clinic as p order by p.description
from MedProcedureCat as p order by p.symbolMedProcedureCat
from MedProcedureType as p order by p.symbolMedProcedureType
from MedProcedure as p order by p.procedureDate, p.patient.pesel, p.noAdm
from Admission as p order by p.admissionDate, p.patient.pesel
